Articles.Content:
So I'm getting back into blender full swing again but I do need help learning things, including learning blender more, and most importantly, learning to make my own textures. The KSP forum is a great place but not well suited for this. I've done google searches and the only really active forum that could help with this stuff if full of people who expect you to know everthing about making textures and every little feature in blender.

Anyone got any to share?
